Package de.uni_hannover.hci.cardgame.Controller

Class GameBoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_hannover.hci.cardgame.Controller.GameBoardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerInterface
    public class GameBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerInterface
    Controls the GameBoard and with that the heart components of the clients part in the game
    Author:
    Yann Bernhard <yann.bernhard@stud.uni-hannover.de>, Sebastian Kiel <sebastian.kiel@stud.uni-hannover.de>, Patrick Schewe <p.schewe@stud.uni-hannover.de>, Robert Witteck <robert.witteck@stud.uni-hannover.de>

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Instantiates the gameboard pane and the draw pile of cards Pane and counter.
        Specified by:
        init in interface ControllerInterface

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect client from server and kill client socket. Afterwards sends user to home screen.

      • cardClicked

        public void cardClicked​(int nr)
        Sends a string containing the clicked card to the server.
        Parameters:
        nr - the id of the card

      • pass

        public void pass()
        Sends pass command to the server if pass button is clicked.

      • take

        public void take()
        Sends take command to the server if take button is clicked.

      • executeLine

        public void executeLine​(java.lang.String line)
        Execute a message/command received from the server. If the message is the game state, this message is parsed to redraw the current state on the game board
        Parameters:
        line - command line to execute, that was gotten from the clientsockets bufferIn.

      • draw

        public void draw​(ParsedServerMessage parsedServerMessage)
        Draw the current game state on the game board. Expects the message String to be a valid Gamestate
        Parameters:
        parsedServerMessage - the parsed server message with the game state.

      • drawTrump

        public void drawTrump​(CardColor trump)
        Draw current trump color to game board.
        Parameters:
        trump - the trump color.

      • drawCard

        public void drawCard​(int cardNumber,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     boolean isHandCard)
        Draws a card on the game board, if its a handcard adds a click event that tells the server that the caard was clicked
        Parameters:
        cardNumber - the card number/Id
        x - the x-positon
        y - the y-positon
        isHandCard - hand card or played card
